## Channel interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Channel 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [builder](./stentor-models.channel.builder.md) | new (props: object) =&gt; [AbstractResponseBuilder](./stentor-models.abstractresponsebuilder.md) | Response builder, this is now deprecated in favor of providing a response translator. |
|  [hooks](./stentor-models.channel.hooks.md) | [ChannelHooks](./stentor-models.channelhooks.md) | Runtime hooks used by the channel to make any necessary checks or modifications |
|  [name](./stentor-models.channel.name.md) | string | The name of the channel.<!-- -->This must be alphanumeric characters only, dashes instead of spaces.<!-- -->For example: "actions-on-google" or "alexa"<!-- -->This is used in analytics and in some cases platform selection if the platform is provided in the URL as a query or path parameter. |
|  [nlu](./stentor-models.channel.nlu.md) | [NLUService](./stentor-models.nluservice.md) | The NLU for the channel |
|  [request](./stentor-models.channel.request.md) | Translator&lt;object, Request&gt; | Request translator (an instantiated class) |
|  [response](./stentor-models.channel.response.md) | Translator&lt;[RequestResponse](./stentor-models.requestresponse.md)<!-- -->, object&gt; | Response translator (an instantiated class) |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [capabilities(body)](./stentor-models.channel.capabilities.md) | Determine the capabilities and contextual information related to the device the user is accessing the channel on. |
|  [test(body)](./stentor-models.channel.test.md) | Optional function that tests the incoming request to see if it is a request for the channel.<!-- -->It returns true if the request is for the channel.<!-- -->If one isn't provided, it will rely on the name to determine the channel. |
